headline: Bayer Selects Northern Trust as Provider for Digital Lifecycle Management of Carbon Credits
summary: CHICAGO, March 18, 2025--Part of Bayer’s carbon credits inventory has been recorded on The Northern Trust Carbon Ecosystem, a digital platform for transactions and custody.
